title: Switch 2 Details from Activision & Elder Scrolls 6 Skips PS5 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.18.23
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

Blessing and Tim talk about Nintendo Switch 2 details from Activision, Elder Scrolls 6 skipping PS5, and Mortal Kombat 1 looking wonky on Switch.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:50 - Housekeeping
Part 4 of Greg and Brian Altano’s 20 Minutes of Tears is up now! The episode is called “How do Moblin’s Make Babies”. And Roger Pokorny says in this episode “Greg and Brian get to the bottom of how Moblin’s make babies”. You can catch it over on Youtube.com/KidnaFunnyGames
Tomorrow you can get Tims shirt
Today after KFGD, Kinda Munchies is getting SPICY! Join Mike, Roger, Gary Whitta,  and Fran Mirabella for a spicy noodle taste test challenge! Check it out live on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames or Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Brave Athos,JediMasterDeadpool, Delaney Twining
The Roper Report   -
